name: Blue Sky Aero, Inc.
baseAirport: C09 -Morris Municipal - James R Washburn Field
about: Blue Sky Aero, Inc., established in 2003, is a comprehensive flight training and maintenance facility. Located at the Campbell Airport (C09), the school offers a range of training programs, including private and commercial pilot certificates. Specializing in tailwheel training, RV, and Stearman transition training, as well as aerobatic dual instruction, Blue Sky Aero provides a unique and diverse flying experience. The school also offers aircraft relocation services and maintains a fleet of well-maintained aircraft. With a focus on safety and fun, Blue Sky Aero is dedicated to providing high-quality aviation education and services to its students. Whether you're a novice pilot or an experienced aviator, Blue Sky Aero is committed to helping you achieve your flying goals.
